title: With Nang & Nakorn in Thailand
creator_credit: Gail Singer, David Springbett, Heather MacAndrew and Asterisk Film and Videotape Productions
brief_description: Shows the activities of tow boys in the village of Con May in Thailand, including catching fish and lizards with their bare hands. The film also notes the building of a traditional Thai house on stilts, and highlights religion, extended family relationships and their use of technology.
creator_credit_for_label: Gail Singer, David Springbett, Heather MacAndrew and Asterisk Film and Videotape Productions
